activities

  • I am one of the tutors for the Advanced Instructional School on Geometric Analysis to be held from 9 to 28 December 2019 at Indian Institute of Technology Bombay, Mumbai, India.

  • From August 26 - September 6 2019, I will be visiting International Centre for Theoretical Sciences, Bangalore to attend a discussion meeting on Multi-scale Analysis and Theory of Homogenization

  • I was on the organizing committee of the Diamond Jubilee Symposium of the Department of Mathematics, Indian Institute of Technology Bombay which was held in 4-6 January 2019.
